name: MyFarewells.com
tag_list: farewell, suicide, passway, dead, goodbye, lost-one, loved-one, broken-up-with, sad, mad, glad, happy, passed-away, depressed, good-bye, died, grieve, health
overview:
As its name implies, this is a place to say your last farewell to someone that has passed away. Any psychologist could tell you the role that such a resource could play out â€“ the key words here are â€œreleaseâ€ and â€œliberationâ€.

In addition to telling everybody the way that you feel, on the site you can find fellow souls that click on the â€œI relate to your farewellâ€ link that is included along with the story you have posted. Of course, each story also bears a â€œCommentsâ€ section for others to offer their support. A â€œSorry to hear your farewellâ€ also serves that function.

As the programmer explains, he once lost someone and wished there had been a place where he could have paid his last respects to him, and also to vent his feelings and let it all out.

The website is interesting if only because there are not that many resources that let you do exactly the same.
